main.name: Sasha Ailen Franchini
main.description: I'm a Front-end developer and UX/UI Designer.
main.bio: I'm an advanced student at the Faculty of Exact Sciences - UNICEN University. I'm a Full Stack Developer but I focus on Frontend technologies, looking for new languages and design tools to keep moving forward as a professional and always give my best.

resume.skillmessage: There's always a chance to get better in every situation. Talking about web development technologies; I honestly believe I can improve myself even more and because of that idea, I can't ever say I know something 100%.

education.degree: Computer Software and Media Applications Major
education.description: This career TUDAI (stands for: Tecnicatura en Desarrollo de Aplicaciones Inform√°ticas) is a place to become a fullstack developer with a University degree. They gave us the possibility to test a lot of technologies and languages but I always focus and trained myself as a frontend developer.
A Business Management but truly focus on technologies, which gives you a lot of room to improve yourself at this area.

work.title: Mentor
work.description: Being present in the learning process, doing continuous monitoring to achieve a final project, which must be presented. Different languages tutor, class planner and Teacher's helper
